name: Aegios - Demo
description:
"Hallowed Aegios, brightest light in the skies, I ask of you in your name. lluminate me with your wisdom so I may step out of the shadows. I seek this of you in the presence of your o most merciful gods. Bless me with your gracious favor."

You’ve heard this prayer far too many times during your years of travel. However, these soothing words of false hope make you sick. Everyone praises Aegios, the gods’ home high in the sky, but something itches inside you whenever you look at it.

  

Aegios is a visual novel we created for the Yaoi Game Jam 2022. At the moment, it is only a demo but we plan to continue this adventure and finish the game.

  

             - The first part of the game's story.
             - An enigmatic love interest.
             - A quite moody MC.
             - 3 Illustrations to unlock

  

             - At least 6 different endings.
             - 6 illustrations to unlock.
             - Discover the truth behind Aegios
             - More shenanigans between our two special characters.

  

   

You’ve been searching for your lost memories for years. Strangely, that floating island appears to be your only starting point. Is your journey going to be fruitful? This is entirely dependent on your actions. 

 

   

The mysterious and enigmatic librarian. He seems friendly and wants to help you in your research . But there's something about him you can't put your finger on... 
Is it his annoying smile? Must be it.

 

     

The game contains religious theme, violence and death. Warnings will be updated along with the game.
